data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 3, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Fabian Castillo.
Great play from Edgar Lopez to set up the goal.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick Monterrey.
Dorlan Pabon for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tijuana.
In the minute 8, Jorge Perez signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente's Mauro Lainez has been booked in Tijuana.
In the minute 10, Vincent Janssen of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jorge Perez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 12, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente attack through Edgar Lopez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Caliente.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio Caliente.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 21, Monterrey's Matias Kranevitter gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In the minute 24, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Goal! Monterrey go level at 1-1 through Rogelio Funes Mori in Tijuana.
Dorlan Pabon with an assist there.
In the minute 27, Tijuana de Caliente's Christian Rivera breaks free at Estadio Caliente. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jorge Perez awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rogelio Funes Mori for Monterrey drives towards goal at Estadio Caliente. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Bryan Angulo for the home team is judged to be offside.
Jorge Perez blows against Tijuana de Caliente's Christian Rivera for offside.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a Monterrey throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Tijuana de Caliente's Fabian Castillo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Jorge Perez will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 45, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Caliente.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 47, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Monterrey's Matias Kranevitter gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tijuana de Caliente defender.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Monterrey.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 52, Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 54, Fabian Castillo scores to make it 2-1 at Estadio Caliente.
Bryan Angulo instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 56, Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Fabian Castillo's finish is wide of the goal.
Jorge Perez awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Caliente with Maximiliano Meza replacing Vincent Janssen.
Throw-in high up the field for Tijuana de Caliente in Tijuana.
In the minute 60, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
In the minute 62, Free kick in a good position for Monterrey!
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Jorge Perez signals a Monterrey throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente are coming forward and Christian Rivera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
The away team replace Jesus Gallardo with Miguel Layun.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Pablo Guede (Tijuana de Caliente) is making a first substitution, with Marcel Ruiz replacing Jordi Cortizo.
In the minute 71, Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente drive forward through Bryan Angulo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Christian Rivera with Kevin Balanta. This is the second substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 78, Attention is being given to Tijuana de Caliente’s Fabian Castillo and play has been suspended briefly.
It seems as if Fabian Castillo is unable to continue. Aldo Cruz replaces him for the home team.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 81, Jose Alvarado is on a sub for Matias Kranevitter for Monterrey.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 83, Jonathan Gonzalez is replacing Stefan Medina for Monterrey at Estadio Caliente.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Monterrey's Maximiliano Meza misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 85, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 89, Monterrey are coming forward and Miguel Layun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jorge Perez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Angulo is on target but unsuccessful.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Tijuana.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Monterrey.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
In Tijuana, Maximiliano Meza of Monterrey is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente close to the penalty box.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Can Monterrey capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Jorge Perez blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
